mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (room_id, sender, nickname, message, message_type, sent_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{sender}, #{nickname}, #{message}, #{type}, #{sentAt})
mapper.select: SELECT message_id as messageId, room_id as roomId, sender, nickname, message, message_type as type, sent_at as sentAt FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY sent_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (room_id, room_name, created_by, room_password, max_users) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{roomName}, #{createdBy}, #{roomPassword}, #{maxUsers})
mapper.select: SELECT room_id as roomId, room_name as roomName, created_by as createdBy, room_password as roomPassword, max_users as maxUsers, current_users as currentUsers, created_at as createdAt FROM chat_room ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT room_id as roomId, room_name as roomName, created_by as createdBy, room_password as roomPassword, max_users as maxUsers, current_users as currentUsers, created_at as createdAt FROM chat_room WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chat_room_participant WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND member_id = #{memberId}
